1983: The Canary Islands, Off the Northwest African Coast
We finally pulled up the treasure chest that sank one hundred years ago!
Is not it a bit long and narrow to be a treasure chest?
You are lifting it too high!
Okay, I am putting it down.
H-Hurry up and pry it open.
This box is locked from the inside.
There is something written on it.
What the hell does it matter?!
The sun's going to set soon.
Once it gets dark, we will not be able to see anything!
Okay, I will go get the blowtorch.
Let us say hello to our treasure!
One day, an unmanned cabin cruiser was spotted.
The boat was in perfect working order, and there were no signs of an attack.
Aboard, there were only three half-full cups of coffee,
On deck, a steel box, which had been opened with an acetylene torch.
and strangely, it had two compartments, as if designed to shelter something.
It was thought to have contained treasure,
but after a few months, it was forgotten.
His father is Japanese, and a jazz musician.
His mother is an American of British descent.
Yes, Jotaro is definitely my son.
Apparently, his friends at school call him Jojo,
derived from the Jo of Jotaro and the jo in Kujo.
How many people did Jotaro kill?!
I do not want to hear!
Uh, who said he killed anybody?
Actually, the thugs he faced were armed with nunchucks and knives.
There were four, including a former boxer,
and between them, fifteen bones were broken.
They all had their balls crushed, too...
And they were sent to the hospital.
Madam, please make sure he learns his lesson!
But the problem is what happened after.
Could you copy this and pass it around?
Your son is quite the oddball.
We will show you the way.
Well, anyway, please take him home.
Well, we cannot keep him forever.
By the way, madam, your Japanese is very good.
How long have you lived in Japan?
We have had our hands full lately.
There is even a waiting list for cells.
Your son is just up ahead.
Jotaro, throw the ball to Mama!
Do your best at the sports meet tomorrow.
What would you like to eat today?
I just want to eat your cooking, Mom.
You are so damn annoying, you bitch!
He is actually a very sweet child.
Episode 1: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit
He is not capable of doing something so appalling.
What part of go home do not you understand?!
I am not going to leave here for a while.
I have been possessed by an evil spirit.
I do not know what he will make me do.
Even during the fight, it took all I had to stop it.
So do not let me out of this cell.
See what I am talking about, madam?
We are trying to release him, but he refuses to leave.
Forgive my asking, but is your son all right upstairs?
There really is an evil spirit possessing him!
We will not do anything bad again!
How did you get that in here?!
The evil spirit brings things to me.
He tosses him out of the ring!
H-He is listening to a boombox and reading Shonen Jump!
This might not be enough to stop you from releasing me.
I will show you what a terror my evil spirit can be.
Just so you will understand how dangerous it could be to let me out.
Did you guys see my evil spirit just now?!
It seems to have possessed me recently.
His grandpa, Joseph, had strange powers...
B-But what is happening to my son?
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
I am so glad you came!
If my only daughter needs my help,
I can be anywhere in the world within 24 hours!
But I told Suzie it was a business trip for Joestar Real Estate Agency.
It is been forever since you have held me, Papa!
How can you talk like that?
Oh, now you have done it!
I am going to tickle you!
What the hell are you guys staring at?
By the way, Holly, about Jotaro...
You are certain he said evil spirit?
The policemen said they could not see it,
Others could not see it, but you could?
So Jotaro says that he is been possessed recently,
but nothing strange has happened to you?
But Jotaro says he will not leave the cell until he knows what is going on.
I, Joseph Joestar, am here now, so there is nothing to worry about.
First, I would like to hurry
He is got more stuff again...
There is something terrifying possessing him...
I-If anyone outside found out about this, I would lose my job in a heartbeat.
I will take my grandson home.
Hey, what are you planning to do?
I told you, you cannot go in any further!
We cannot be held responsible for this!
Come now, you are in the way.
I am sure he will be able to help you!
Please come out with your grandfather.
I did not ask you to come here.
What the hell can you do?
Sorry you came all the way from New York,
but there is no way you can help me.
Th-The pinky from my artificial left hand!
Do not get close to me.
You will just shorten what little life you have left.
It was able to deceive me right off the bat...
I know exactly what Jotaro's evil spirit is.
But rather than explaining it with words,
if he experiences the truth himself,
he will understand it much better.
No, he needs to physically understand,
because of the dangers he will face in the future.
This is my Egyptian friend I met three years ago,
Chase my grandson Jotaro out of this cell.
He looks strong, but do you really think I would let someone
chase me out of here just because you told him to do it?
Now I am just going to be even more stubborn
and want to leave even less.
I will have to get a bit violent.
But soon enough, he will be so addled with pain,
he will be squealing, Please get me out of here.
Avdol also has a so-called evil spirit.
An evil spirit that Avdol can control freely!
Kujo's plastered himself against the wall and will not move.
I do not get this at all.
B-But is not it getting sort of...
And the fact that it is so clearly visible means it is very powerful.
I cannot believe he is able to make it manifest this clearly!
I am surprised you have an evil spirit, too.
And Grandpa, the identity of the evil spirit...
you asked me to get your grandson out of the cell.
I was planning on holding back,
but considering its unexpected power, one misstep and we will be in danger.
If you still insist that I get him out, I will have to get violent enough
to send your grandson to the hospital.
I have no idea what is going on!
What are you doing to Jotaro?!
Holly, be a good girl and keep quiet.
If the heat is restricting your breathing,
It may seem like an evil spirit, but it is not.
What you believed to be an evil spirit
is a powerful vision, created from your own life energy.
Because it appears next to you, that vision is called...
the cold wind only made the traveler pull his coat on tight,
but the heat made him admit defeat.
Do you want to come out of your cage now, Jojo?
The reason I will not leave
is because I keep harming others without realizing it.
Sure, it interests me that you have an evil spirit, too.
Do not say I did not warn you!
Why did you suddenly turn your back on me?!
As you can see, I have gotten him out of his cell.
Are you saying you let me win?
I truly did plan to send you to the hospital,
but I did not expect such power.
If I had not stopped this steel rod, what were you going to do?
It could melt a steel rod like this in the air with ease.
Avdol has the same power as you.
You do not have to stay in that cell
to research your evil spirit any longer.
Jotaro finally came out of his cell.
You are so annoying, you bitch.
How dare you call your own mother a bitch, huh?!
And, Holly, stop smiling after he just called you that!
I am going to ask you about one thing I do not understand.
Why did you know about my evil spirit no, my Stand or whatever?
That is what I do not understand.
I came all the way from New York to explain that.
But in order to explain it, I must start at the beginning.
This has to do with the Joestar family.
First, take a look at these pictures.
That is a hundred-year-old coffin pulled up from the Atlantic Ocean,
off the African coast four years ago.
After I obtained and researched it,
I found out that it was on the boat where my grandfather,
the man four generations before you, Jonathan Joestar, died.
It was apparently empty when they discovered it.
But I know exactly what was inside!
Avdol and I are trying to locate him as we speak.
You are making it sound like there was a person in there.
Why would you call something lost at sea for a hundred years him?
He has awakened from his hundred-year sleep.
We are fated to fight him!
Do not make a face like this has nothing to do with you!
That was so stupid, I do not know what to say, Gramps.
I do not know who you are, but you are sure full of yourself.
And Old Man, do you expect me to hear such a crazy story
and just say, Oh, I see, and believe it?
But is it not a fact that our evil spirits are crazy, as well?
Soon, you will have no choice but to believe.
If you ask me why I know of Dio's existence,
and why I am after him...
I will show you the reason.
I also suddenly obtained an evil spirit, or rather, the power of a Stand.
The thorns that came from my hand?
Its power is to take spirit photos of visions I captured from far-off places!
Though I have to smash and destroy a 30,000 yen camera every time I do it.
The vision that is going to appear in this picture,
will be what determines your fate!
Holly, have either of you ever looked carefully at the back of your necks?
You have probably never taken a close look.
But right around the base of my neck, there is a star-shaped birthmark.
What the hell does all this mean?
I asked my mother about it,
and she said that my father, who died when I was young, also had it.
Apparently, those of the Joestar bloodline all have this birthmark.
I am asking you what is going to show up on that photo.
It is our destiny, as yet undiscovered!
Damn it, just show me what is on it already!
He is always the one who shows up in my spirit photos.
And on the back of his neck...
is the body of my grandfather, Jonathan Joestar,
which that bastard has taken over!
A hundred years ago, an incident occurred in the Atlantic Ocean.
I only know what I heard from my grandmother, Erina,
but Dio took over the body of my grandfather and survived!
He is currently hiding somewhere in the world, plotting something!
It is been four years since he came back.
The reason my spirit photos and your evil spirits
all began manifesting in this past year...
In the wider world, our gifts are considered psychic powers.
I have had my Stand since birth,
but your powers are bound to Dio's body...
In other words, Jonathan's body, by invisible threads.
All we can say now is that Dio's existence is what brought forth
the powers that were dormant within you.
Avdol, from this photo, can you tell where he is now?
There is hardly any background visible.
I will take a closer look.
I apologize for bringing all this up so suddenly.
I will be staying in Japan for a while.
And I will be staying at your place.
Just now, it felt as though someone was watching me again.
Is it Jonathan's descendants, after all?
This body must be sending out some kind of soul signal to his descendants.
A fate I must be rid of,
I have already made my move.
Does this look like a pen to you?!
The loser is the evil one.
The one who will be the judge is...
